eegdash.dataset.DS003555
========================

Dataset of EEG recordings of pediatric patients with epilepsy based on the 10-20 system (OpenNeuro ``ds003555``). Access recordings and metadata through EEGDash.

.. rst-class:: sd-badges

:bdg-light:`Modality: eeg` :bdg-light:`Tasks: 1` :bdg-light:`License: CC0` :bdg-light:`Subjects: 30` :bdg-light:`Recordings: 30` :bdg-light:`Source: openneuro`

     - ``DS003555``

     - Dataset of EEG recordings of pediatric patients with epilepsy based on the 10-20 system
   * - Year
     - Unknown
   * - Authors
     - Dorottya Cserpan, Ece Boran, Richard Rosch, San Pietro Lo Biundo, Georgia Ramantani, Johannes Sarnthein

     - CC0
   * - Citation / DOI
     - `10.18112/openneuro.ds003555.v1.0.1 <https://doi.org/10.18112/openneuro.ds003555.v1.0.1>`__
   * - Source links
     - `OpenNeuro <https://openneuro.org/datasets/ds003555>`__ | `NeMAR <https://nemar.org/dataexplorer/detail?dataset_id=ds003555>`__

Quickstart
----------

**Install**

.. code-block:: bash

   pip install eegdash

**Load a recording**

.. code-block:: python

   from eegdash.dataset import DS003555

   dataset = DS003555(cache_dir="./data")
   recording = dataset[0]
   raw = recording.load()

**Filter/query**

.. tab-set::

   .. tab-item:: Basic

      .. code-block:: python

         dataset = DS003555(cache_dir="./data", subject="01")

   .. tab-item:: Advanced

      .. code-block:: python

         dataset = DS003555(
             cache_dir="./data",
             query={"subject": {"$in": ["01", "02"]}},
         )
